title: Professional Summary
text: Hossein Khan Beigi - Front-end Developer with 8 years of experience building scalable web applications using JavaScript, ReactJS, NextJS, and TypeScript. Specialized in blockchain development with Solidity and web3.js. Successfully delivered 15+ enterprise applications, achieving 40% performance improvements through optimized code and modern architecture. Led teams of up to 8 developers in implementing complex features while maintaining 95% code coverage through comprehensive testing.

title: Current Role - Lead Front-end Developer at kian Digital
text: Lead Front-end Developer at kian Digital (Tehran, Iran) since January 2022. Developed and integrated AI-powered frontend features including intelligent dashboards and chatbots for blockchain-based financial applications. Worked extensively with LangChain, LLMs (Large Language Models), and vector databases to deliver advanced user experiences and conversational AI features. Implemented advanced KYC (Know Your Customer) solutions using face detection and verification, enhancing user onboarding security and compliance. Built data visualizations and analytics tools using D3.js and Chart.js for complex financial and blockchain data.

title: Senior Front-end Developer at Supnex
text: Senior Front-end Developer at Supnex (Dubai, UAE - Remote) from January 2020 to December 2023. Accelerated team productivity by 10% through refactoring project resources, cutting feature implementation cycles by 25% and increasing code reusability by 40%. Established and enhanced a customized UI library incorporating Material Design principles, resulting in 40% reduction in bundle size and 70% increase in personalization metrics. Streamlined admin panel for product management, leading to 10% support team efficiency improvement and reducing customer ticket resolution time by 35%. Coordinated with DevOps teams to containerize applications using Docker, enhancing deployment efficiency by 25% and reducing deployment failures by 80%.

title: Front-end Developer at Elevāt
text: Front-end Developer at Elevāt (United States - Remote) from January 2017 to December 2020. Developed and maintained a scalable admin panel that improved data processing efficiency by 40% through enhanced querying and visualization features, reducing report generation time from 2 hours to 30 minutes. Directed a team of 8 developers across 2 high-impact projects, delivering 30% improvement in API response times through refined database schema design and efficient CRUD operations, resulting in 50% faster data retrieval.

title: Technical Skills
text: Programming Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP. Frontend Frameworks: React.js, Next.js, Angular, Vue.js, Polymer.js. Data Visualization: D3.js, Chart.js, Recharts, real-time data visualization. AI & Machine Learning: LLMs, LangChain, AI APIs, vector databases, machine learning basics. State Management: Redux, Zustand. Blockchain Development: Solidity, web3.js, blockchain applications. DevOps & Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, RESTful APIs, Material Design, Jest, Karma, Jasmine. Other: KYC, face detection, analytics tools, accessibility, responsive design, cross-functional collaboration.

title: Education
text: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence from University of Sharif (January 2013 - December 2016). This educational background provides strong foundation in AI/ML concepts which complements practical experience with LLMs, LangChain, and vector databases in current role.

title: Key Achievements
text: Delivered 15+ enterprise applications with 40% performance improvements. Led teams of up to 8 developers. Achieved 95% code coverage through comprehensive testing. Reduced bundle size by 40% and increased personalization metrics by 70%. Improved data processing efficiency by 40%, reducing report generation from 2 hours to 30 minutes. Enhanced API response times by 30% and data retrieval by 50%. Processed 1M+ security events daily and 2M+ daily events in security monitoring systems.

title: AI and Blockchain Expertise
text: Extensive experience with AI-powered features including intelligent dashboards and chatbots. Deep knowledge of LangChain, LLMs, and vector databases for conversational AI. Implemented KYC solutions with face detection and verification. Strong blockchain development skills with Solidity and web3.js for financial applications. Experience building data visualizations for complex financial and blockchain data using D3.js and Chart.js.

title: OrgMeter - Company Information
text: OrgMeter is a platform for the Merchant Cash Advance (MCA) industry. It helps with deal flow, tracking, and reporting. Key features: automated collections for debt recovery, efficient underwriting tools, automated bank statement analysis, document management, syndication tracking, centralized partner access, detailed reporting, and API integrations. The platform serves funders, syndicators, and Independent Sales Organizations (ISOs). OrgMeter processes over $7.5 billion in funding and 2+ million submissions. They focus on automation, API integrations, complex workflows, and financial technology solutions.

title: What OrgMeter Looks For
text: OrgMeter likely values: experience with automated systems and workflows, API integration skills, ability to handle complex financial data and workflows, knowledge of financial technology or MCA industry, experience with data processing and analysis tools, ability to build scalable platforms, experience with document management systems, and skills in building reporting and analytics features.
